import React, { Component,useState } from 'react'; const Register = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', email: '', password: '', password2: '' }) const { name, email, password, password2 } = formData const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(formData) } return (
